name: Membership By PluginsCorner
author: Plugins Corner

sections.description:
Membership by PluginsCorner

Before installing the plugin make sure your host has PHP at version 8.0 installed.

Build Memberships Quick and Easy with “Membership By Plugins Corner”

Build membership blogs or websites, sell online courses, or even digital products with PLUCO Membership. Have easy access to protection rules without having to search for them in Settings pages, Generate custom invoices for your clients and access advanced statistics with churn rates to have a better understanding of how your business is going.

Feature List

  1. WordPress support or Low Priority in App support if you register for free priority at http://pluginscorner.com/free-registration/
  2. Unlimited Memberships
  3. Unlimited Recurrences
  4. Unlimited Members
  5. Paypal Payment
  6. Stripe Payment
  7. Enable/Disable Memberships
  8. Create and Assign Custom Roles
  9. Auto-renew
  10. Access to Payments
  11. Custom Email Templates
  12. Custom Restriction Messages
  13. Admin Area Restrictions
  14. Login Shortcode
  15. Account Management Shortcode

Get The Pro version for these aditional features

  1. In App Support
  2. Access to advanced Statistics
  3. SendGrid Email Service Integration
  4. Custom Registration Fields With Gutenberg & Elementor
  5. Restrict menu items
  6. reCaptcha V3
  7. Authorize.net Payment (coming soon)
  8. Invoicing System
  9. Drip Content (coming soon)
  10. Membership Colors

What’s next?

We’re trying to update the plugin as much as possible in order to ofer new an exciting features, as well as fixing any bugs.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/pluco-membership directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. A Pop-Up Guide will appear, follow the steps to get set up. For more details check https://pluginsorner.com/documentation/membership-documentation/
sections.changelog:
0.9.1

  • Added Complementary Memberships. You can now assign to any member and non member in the admin area any membership as complementary either for a limited or unlimited amount of time

0.9.0

  • Added Admin Area Members Filtration for Active, Pending Suspended & Canceled Members
  • Added Admin Area Members Filtration Non Members

0.8.3

  • Added Restrictions to add recurrences to the non member membership. This is only used to assign for free members
  • Small Fixes to the user data for the account

0.8.2

  • Fixed Non Members Memberships being suspended because of no billing date being attached
  • Fixed suspended memberships failing to cancel because of empty billing date

0.8.1

  • Fix For recurrences not being edited

0.8.0

  • Released Beta Version of the plugin. For a feature list visit http://pluginscorner.com/pluco-membership/#pricing
